ComicInfo.Penciller: Jack Sparling,George Olesen,Ben Brown,George Olesen,Jack Sparling,Ben Brown
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Son of Satan: Satan replaces the newly born son of a simple countryfolk couple with an evil imp of his making. By showing this creature parental love, Satan will be able to ascend to earth and rule. But things go not according to plan.
It Came from the Bottom of the World!: When crossing the equator for a first time aboard a ship, all passengers take part in a ceremonial dunking in the ship's swimming pool. One man refuses. He is visited by Neptune himself.
Too Much Steam!: A killer relaxes after a hit in a steam room. When the steam gets hotter by the minute, the man realizes where he's really gone to.
The Power of the Purple Claw: How Dr. Jonathan Weir comes into possession of the powerful artefact known as "The Purple Claw". His first opponent is fiendish Dr. Gool, who injects deceased people with his radioactive living fluid and forms an army of the undead.
The Devil Is a Dame!: Weir's second opponent is gun moll Brima Stone, who is a witch commanding demonic powers.
ComicInfo.Title: The Son of Satan; It Came from the Bottom of the World!; Too Much Steam!; The Power of the Purple Claw; The Devil Is a Dame!
